page.title: 12LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: AS THE REGION IS RURAL PEOPLE HAVE TO TRAVEL FOR MANY ORGANISED ACTIVITIES. WITHIN EACH OF THE VILLAGES THERE ARE MANY OF THE TRADITIONAL ORGANISATIONS TO BE FOUND: CUBS, BROWNIES, GUIDES, SCOUTS, DARTS CLUB, CHURCH CLUBS, PENSIONERS CLUBS, DRAMA CLUBS, GARDENING CLUBS, ARE BUT A FEW OF THE 40 ORGANISATIONS TO BE FOUND. THERE IS A GREAT COMMUNITY SPIRIT, WITH PEOPLE WILLING TO ASSIST IN MANY THINGS. OUTDOOR ACTIVITIES ARE VERY POPULAR WITH TRIPS TO THE COAST, TO SPORTING FIXTURES AND FOR WALKING AND CYCLING. GARDENING, HORSE RIDING AND KITE FLYING ARE ALL POPULAR ACTIVITIES. INDOOR ACTIVITIES INCLUDE WATCHING TELEVISION, LISTENING TO MUSIC, READING AND DANCING. MANY ACTIVITIES ARE FAMILY ACTIVITIES.
